title: Designing Blended Learning-Based Social Studies Curriculum Using Digital Devices

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Device Usage Skills and Fundamental Understanding of Elementary Curriculum
context.additional_context: Systematic acquisition of methods for applying blended learning using digital devices to social studies education, targeting prospective elementary teachers and education sector job seekers

learning_goals: Learners can design social studies learning activities using digital devices
Learners can apply at least three strategies to increase engagement among elementary learners in blended learning environments
Learners can develop and implement social studies lesson models using digital tools through project-based assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
